titles.title: I Get So Thrilled With Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I get so thrilled with Jesus,
ev'ry moment of the day.
I get so thrilled with Jesus,
He's the truth, the life, the way.
I get so thrilled with Jesus,
He satisfies my longing soul.
I get so thrilled with Jesus,
He's the One who makes me whole.
